thread.title: Chance the Rapper Talks 'Secret' DJ Khaled Project on Grammy Red Carpet
thread.title_full: Chance the Rapper Talks 'Secret' DJ Khaled Project on Grammy Red Carpet

author: Carl Lamarre
title: Chance the Rapper Talks 'Secret' DJ Khaled Project on Grammy Red Carpet
text:
COMMENTS 
On Sunday night (Feb. 12), Chance the Rapper soared his way to three Grammys for his opus Coloring Book . Before the show commenced, the Chi-Town rapper celebrated his first Grammy win for best rap performance for "No Problem" featuring Lil Wayne & 2 Chainz with Billboard's Adelle Platon on the red carpet. 
"I got one win now. I won best rap performance along with Lil Wayne & 2 Chainz for 'No Problem' off Coloring Book ," Chance exclaimed. When asked to provide a quick thank you speech, Chance shouted out the biggest supporter on his team. "I wanna thank God, obviously, for providing the music that I make and the team that's surrounded me," Chance said. 
He also gave some insight regarding his collaboration on DJ Khaled's forthcoming album Grateful . "It's actually super top-secret, but I'm very involved in the project and shout-outs to DJ Khaled for coming up on 10 summers." 
After, Chance spoke on the biggest key he received while being locked in the studio with Khaled. "Love more. That's his thing. Love is key and that's real," he answered swiftly. 
Watch his interview with Billboard above.
